Articles.Content:
Well, not very new: 46 old "young adult" here!

I'm Max, "annoluce" standing for lightyear in italian. My nick since a longtime. I live in Rome.

I approached KSP some time ago. Now really starting to enjoy it!

I'm an aerospace engineer. I worked in aerospace industry (rocket propulsion design for the european VEGA launcher) many years ago. Then I moved on to the IT market, and now back to Air Transport Industry, working for a global service provider for airports and airlines.

I have to say that I studied a lot of astrodynamics, but nothing is like KSP when it comes to actually understand how orbits work! This piece of SW is truly amazing. I'm having a lot of fun!

I hope to enjoy this community and learn a lot.

Thanks

Max

Edited September 22, 2017 by Annoluce
Welcome to the forum, Annoluce. You will find several Italians are already here.
Welcome to the forum. I'm not Italian, but I visited Italy a couple years ago (and we did't want to leave, lol).
I love Italy.  Been many times, have owned Italian bikes and cars, and love Italian food.  Welcome to the forum.
